headline: Colbert on Trump Endorsing Dr. Oz: A ‘Con-Man’ Endorsing Another ‘Con-Man’
sentences: Now, you see, you see, Jon, they both, like — now, I’d like to list all the scams Dr. Oz has tried to foist on his audience, but we only have an hour show.”
Over the weekend, he weighed in on the political future of charlatan and cater-waiter holding the hors d’oeurves tray with his penis, Dr. Mehmet Oz.

EXCERPT:
COLBERT: “There’s news about the former president, The Douche of Hazard.
Specifically, the former president endorsed Dr. Oz for the U.S. Senate.
This story is cross-posted at our consumer site, Grabien News.
Come on, he’s a con man!
